metadata.merchant_copy:
Cancel for any reason - Provided in partnership with Duffel
If you purchase this product we can refund up to 75% of your base fare if you cancel 24 hours before your first scheduled departure. To cancel, please contact us using the details in your email confirmation.

Note this is not insurance and may be purchased in addition to your travel insurance. See the CFAR terms and conditions here: https://duffel.com/cfar_terms_and_conditions.
